TopicTitle: Fine mode for move and rotate tools in VAB/SPH

Articles.Content:
When using rotate or move tools I know about pressing Shift to enable finer degrees of movement. I've watched videos where the user seemed to have higher resolution movements than I have. For example, the rotate tool seems to have 5 degree steps in Fine mode and the move part tool still jumps a fair distance even with Shift depressed. Is there a way to increase that movement resolution or change the step settings so I can make smaller changes?

Thanks!

If you turn off angle snap you have smooth pixel-by-pixel control over the rotation and offset gizmos.

Happy landings!
